alert.note: Alert for Jackson; Shawnee; Wabaunsee (Kansas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued April 23 at 6:31PM CDT until April 23 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Topeka
info.description: The National Weather Service in Topeka has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Shawnee County in east central Kansas... Northeastern Wabaunsee County in east central Kansas... Southeastern Jackson County in northeastern Kansas... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 631 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Willard, moving northeast at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Rossville, Silver Lake, Hoyt, Maple Hill, Mayetta, Denison, Delia and Willard. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 340 and 352. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
